00021 #define ISIS_MATRIX_HPP

00035 template < typename TYPE, size_t COLS, size_t ROWS, typename CONTAINER = typename FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS *COLS>::container_type >
00036 class FixedMatrix : public FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS *COLS, CONTAINER>
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     static const size_t rows = ROWS;
00040     static const size_t columns = COLS;
00041 
00042     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2>
00043     void copyFrom( const FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2> src[ROWS] ) {
00044         for( size_t r = 0; r < ROWS; r++ ) {
00045             const TYPE2 *ptr = &src[r][0];
00046             std::copy( ptr, ptr + COLS, &elem( 0, r ) );
00047         }
00048     }
00049 
00050     FixedMatrix() {}
00051 
00052     template<typename TYPE2>
00053     FixedMatrix( const TYPE2 src[ROWS *COLS] ): FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS *COLS, CONTAINER>( src ) {}
00054 
00055     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2>
00056     FixedMatrix( const FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2> src[ROWS] ) {copyFrom( src );}
00057 
00058     FixedMatrix( const boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<TYPE> &boost_matrix ) throw ( std::logic_error & ) {
00059         if( boost_matrix.size1() == ROWS && boost_matrix.size2() == COLS ) {
00060             for( size_t m = 0; m < ROWS; m++ ) {
00061                 for( size_t n = 0; n < COLS; n++ ) {
00062                     this->elem( n, m ) = boost_matrix( m, n );
00063                 }
00064             }
00065         } else {
00066             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "The size of the boost matrix ("
00067                                   << boost_matrix.size1() << ", " << boost_matrix.size2()
00068                                   << ") does not coincide with the size of the isis matrix (" << ROWS << ", " << COLS << ").";
00069             throw( std::logic_error( "Size mismatch" ) );
00070         }
00071     };
00072 
00073     TYPE &elem( size_t column, size_t row ) {return ( *this )[column + row * COLS];}
00074     const TYPE &elem( size_t column, size_t row )const {return ( *this )[column + row * COLS];}
00075 
00076     boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<TYPE> getBoostMatrix() const {
00077         boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<TYPE> ret = boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<TYPE>( ROWS, COLS );
00078 
00079         for( size_t m = 0; m < ROWS; m++ ) {
00080             for( size_t n = 0; n < COLS; n++ ) {
00081                 ret( m, n ) = this->elem( n, m );
00082             }
00083         }
00084 
00085         return ret;
00086     }
00087 
00088     FixedMatrix<TYPE, ROWS, COLS> transpose()const {
00089         FixedMatrix<TYPE, ROWS, COLS> ret;
00090 
00091         for( size_t m = 0; m < COLS; m++ )
00092             for( size_t n = 0; n < ROWS; n++ ) {
00093                 ret.elem( n, m ) = this->elem( m, n );
00094             }
00095 
00096         return ret;
00097     }
00098 
00099     FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS> inverse( bool &invertible )const throw ( std::logic_error & ) {
00100         if( COLS != ROWS ) {
00101             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Matrix is not a square matrix so is not invertible!";
00102             throw( std::logic_error( "Matrix is not a square matrix so is not invertible!" ) );
00103         }
00104 
00105         using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00106         FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS> ret;
00107         matrix<TYPE> boost_matrix_in = this->getBoostMatrix();
00108         matrix<TYPE> boost_matrix_inverse = matrix<TYPE>( ROWS, COLS );
00109         permutation_matrix<TYPE> pm( boost_matrix_in.size1() );
00110         //check if det is 0 -> singular
00111         invertible = lu_factorize( boost_matrix_in, pm ) == 0;
00112 
00113         if( invertible ) {
00114             boost_matrix_inverse.assign( identity_matrix<TYPE>( boost_matrix_in.size1() ) ) ;
00115             lu_substitute( boost_matrix_in, pm, boost_matrix_inverse );
00116             return FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS>( boost_matrix_inverse );
00117         } else {
00118             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Matrix is singular. Returning initial matrix.";
00119             return *this;
00120         }
00121     }
00122 
00123     template<typename TYPE2, size_t COLS2, typename CONTAINER2> FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS2, ROWS, CONTAINER2>
00124     dot( const FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS2, COLS, CONTAINER2> &right )const {
00125         // transpose the right, so we can use columns as rows
00126         const FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS, COLS2, CONTAINER2> rightT = right.transpose();
00127         const FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS, CONTAINER> &left = *this;
00128         FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS2, ROWS, CONTAINER2> ret;
00129 
00130         for( size_t c = 0; c < right.columns; c++ ) { //result has as much columns as right
00131             const TYPE2 *rstart = &rightT.elem( 0, c );
00132 
00133             for( size_t r = 0; r < left.rows; r++ ) { //result has as much rows as left
00134                 const TYPE *lstart = &left.elem( 0, r ), *lend = lstart + left.columns;
00135                 ret.elem( c, r ) = std::inner_product( lstart, lend, rstart, TYPE2() );
00136             }
00137         }
00138 
00139         return ret;
00140     }
00141 
00142 
00143     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2>
00144     dot( const FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2> &right )const {
00145         const FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS, CONTAINER> &left = *this;
00146         FixedVector<TYPE2, ROWS, CONTAINER2> ret;
00147         const TYPE2 *rstart = &right[0];
00148 
00149         for( size_t r = 0; r < rows; r++ ) { //result has as much rows as left
00150             const TYPE *lstart = &elem( 0, r ), *lend = lstart + left.columns;
00151             ret[r] = std::inner_product( lstart, lend, rstart, TYPE2() );
00152         }
00153 
00154         return ret;
00155     }
00156 
00157     FixedVector<TYPE, COLS> getRow( size_t rownum )const {
00158         FixedVector<TYPE, COLS> ret;
00159         const typename FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS *COLS, CONTAINER>::const_iterator start = FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS * COLS, CONTAINER>::begin() + rownum * COLS;
00160         const typename FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS *COLS, CONTAINER>::const_iterator end = start + COLS;
00161         ret.copyFrom( start, end );
00162         return ret;
00163     }
00164 
00165 
00166 };
00167 
00168 template<typename TYPE, size_t ELEMS>
00169 class IdentityMatrix : public FixedMatrix<TYPE, ELEMS, ELEMS>
00170 {
00171 public:
00172     IdentityMatrix( TYPE value = 1 ) {
00173         for( size_t m = 0; m < ELEMS; m++ ) {
00174             for( size_t n = 0; n < ELEMS; n++ ) {
00175                 if( m == n ) {
00176                     this->elem( n, m ) = static_cast<TYPE>( value );
00177                 } else {
00178                     this->elem( n, m ) = static_cast<TYPE>( 0 );
00179                 }
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183 };
00184 
00185 template<typename TYPE>
00186 class Matrix4x4: public FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4>
00187 {
00188 public:
00189     Matrix4x4( const FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4> &src ): FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4>( src ) {}
00190 
00191     Matrix4x4( const TYPE src[16] ): FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4>( src ) {}
00192     template<typename TYPE2> Matrix4x4(
00193         const FixedVector<TYPE2, 4> &row1,
00194         const FixedVector<TYPE2, 4> &row2,
00195         const FixedVector<TYPE2, 4> &row3 = vector4<TYPE2>( 0, 0, 1, 0 ),
00196         const FixedVector<TYPE2, 4> &row4 = vector4<TYPE2>( 0, 0, 0, 1 )
00197     ) {
00198         const vector4<TYPE2> src[4] = {row1, row2, row3, row4};
00199         FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4>::copyFrom( src );
00200     }
00201 };
00202 
00203 }

00206 namespace std
00207 {
00208 
00209 template<typename charT, typename traits, typename TYPE, size_t COLS, size_t ROWS, typename CONTAINER > basic_ostream<charT, traits>&
00210 operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const ::isis::util::FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS, CONTAINER>& m )
00211 {
00212     out << "FixedMatrix of size (" << m.columns << " columns, " << m.rows << " rows):" << std::endl;
00213 
00214     for( size_t row = 0; row < ROWS; row++ ) {
00215         out << "<";
00216 
00217         for( size_t col = 0; col < COLS; col++ ) {
00218             out << m.elem( col, row );
00219 
00220             if( col < COLS - 1 ) out << "\t";
00221         }
00222 
00223         out << ">" << std::endl;
00224     }
00225 
00226     return out;
00227 }
00228 }
